questionTitle: She likes to sit on the balcony and ________ what goes on below.
"Keep ________ the good work," the teacher told the students, "and you'll all pass the exam".
________ he joined the army my brother had never been abroad.
If you want to join the History Society, you must first ________ this application form.
We haven't got ________ furniture like theirs in our home.
The librarian went to look in the cupboard ________ rare books were kept.
Good teachers ________ children to be kind to each other.
You'll ________ yourself a lot of time if you take the car.
He took out a(n) ________ to the "Guardian".
The government ________ increase taxes soon.
He hit the vase with his elbow and it ________ to the floor.
I absolutely ________ with everything that has been said.
Poor Jack - he lost his homework, and he ________ do it again.
Students are not ________ to smoke in any of the classrooms.
I believe ________ this town needs is a really super disco.
It's still not ________ that John is going to Ravenna tomorrow.
Even though he was often cruel to his dog, it remained faithful ________ him.
She is so keen on learning, you should encourage her ________ her efforts.
The Bolshoi Ballet Company ________ London ________.
There is an increasing ________ nowadays to make films portraying violence.
